content.content: Maker Relay 03  Hey everyone, thanks for checking out Maker Relay! Whether you hold Maker (MKR) or DAI, own a vault, or want to get more involved in MakerDAO governance, this is your one-stop-shop for updates on the MakerDAO ecosystem.  Governance Governance and Risk had their 100th Episode Thursday! This positive note was worth sharing: “I thought I’d mention that this is such an amazing project, we’re at the 100th governance call, and we’re discussing a coveted good problem to have, which is that there’s a ton of demand for Dai. Not just from COMP, but from all over the market. And most startups, most companies, would die (Dai) to be in this position, no pun intended. Or maybe pun intended. I just wanted to call out and I know that we have hard decisions to make, and it’s going to be difficult to figure out how we scale, but this is the right set of circumstances that we want to grow this project. It’s exciting to be here. It’s exciting to be with you guys.” @cmooney  Executive  No current Executive Vote   Polls   Vault Compensation Plan - Approval of this poll moves forward with the other votes laid out in the plan.  Base Rate Poll - The base stability fee rate for all collateral types. Options: -4% to 4%   Inclusion Polls   MIP16 - Weekly Governance Cycle [Discussion]   MIP17 - Weekly Actual Debt Ceiling and Actual Risk Premium Adjustments [Discussion]   MIP18 - Meta-Parameter Adjustments [Discussion]   MIP19 - Liquidations System 1.1 Upgrade [Discussion]   MIP18c4-SP1 - Meta-Parameters: Removing the DSR Spread [Discussion]   MIP4c2-SP5 - Remove dependencies for MIP12 [Discussion]    Collateral Inclusion   MANA: Submission of Domain Team Work Requirements [Discussion]   Want to refresh your voting knowledge? Check out community development’s voter onboarding guide!  MIPs Updates The Maker Improvement Proposal (MIPs) Framework provides a clear process for Maker governance to change the Protocol as needed.  Weekly MIPS Update #8, July 12   Request-For-Comments:  MIP14: Protocol DAI Transfer MIP15: Dark Fix Mechanism   Subproposal  MIP13c-3SP1  Learn more about Maker Improvement Proposals (MIPs)  Domain Teams Risk, Smart Contracts, and Oracles all contributed to the MIP12c2 Domain work for MANA.   Smart Contracts   MIP19 formal submission to upgrade the liquidation system.   Oracles  25 feeds so far (assuming Argent is verified) Creating a proposal to set quorum about the ideal number of feeds. MIP10 hasn’t been refactored yet, so the weekly cycle keeps new collateral moving swiftly.   Risk   Liquidity Mining Response Summary  This thread by @LongForWisdom documents the steps taken to address the growing popularity and effects of liquidity mining on DAI. Including polls from Cyrus, Lev, and Joshua Pritikin. The final Signal request about COMP rewards runs until tomorrow.  Pre-MIP discussion about the PSM This thread by @charlesstlouis introduces a discussion of the issues associated with stabilizing the peg of DAI to USD.     Peg Stability Module   Wouter’s presentation, from the Governance and Risk call, covered mechanics and motivations for a Peg Stability Module.   PSM - Chris Mooney's Diagram1221×334 53.2 KB   A helpful visual aid to the PSM. Find more discussions on this thread or the tag peg-stab    Working Groups  Vault Compensation Analysis Team  Maker Vault Compensation Updates and Status   State of the Peg  Peg1563×545 105 KB   DAI continues to trade above peg, check out the sections above for information about mitigating price issues. There are several peg  solutions on the horizon up for debate.   Dai Supply1422×945 127 KB   Dai Supply 21350×318 45.5 KB   Dai supply at $195 million. Significant increase in ETH-A 200 and 250% Collateralization ratio buckets.   VWAP1383×601 36.1 KB   Volume at around $30.6 million this last week. Average VWAP price places Dai at $ 1.016  Dai Stats | http://dai.descipher.io/  Community  Articles  MakerDAO Approves 4 New Light Feeds For Oracles Welcome to the Evolution: How DeFi is Augmenting the Global Financial System   Maker Forum Deep Dai-ve   Proposal: Use excess USDC from the PSM to buy and burn MKR This thread by @lateot proposes the diversion of funds above an established debt ceiling to a FLAP auction to buy-and-burn Maker (MKR) when DAI sits above the USD peg.  The Target Rate Feedback Mechanism: An Introduction This thread by @Kurt_Barry introduces the Target Rate Feedback Mechanism (TRFM), “an alternative to the DAI Savings Rate (DSR) that has more flexibility in terms of applying directional pressure to the DAI price.”   Social Media  Link to Tweet  Meetings and Events  MakerDAO Open Calls  Community Call  Tuesdays at 16:00 UTC | Crowdcast    Community Collateral Onboarding  Wednesdays at 17:50 UTC | Zoom - Message #governance-and-risk in Maker Chat for password   Governance & Risk  Thursdays at 16:00 UTC | Zoom  Message #governance-and-risk for Admission  Agenda | Dial-in call link | Calendar  Archives Contributing     Community Events  July 14: LenDit Fintech: How DeFi Will Reshape Global Finance (Virtual)  Sept. 15-16: Copenhagen Fintech Week 2020 (Virtual)  Sept. 22-24: Money 20/20 Europe 2020—Amsterdam, Netherlands  Dec. 9-10: Paris Blockchain Week Summit    Hackathons  July 6-27 Unitize - San Francisco Blockchain Week  July 6 - Aug. 6 HackFS  Oct. 2-20 ETHOnline    Reference Links Discuss and debate Maker governance in the Forum and over Maker Chat Propose technical changes, poll, and vote in the Governance Portal Learn more about the Maker protocol in our Documentation  Have Feedback? We value your input! Post in the forum, take our survey, or join us in the Community-Development channel to let us know what you want to see. Disclaimer: This update is assembled by a group of contributing members in the MakerDAO community. This does and should not serve as financial advice or an inducement to vote in any specific way. This update is purely for informative and for communications purposes only.
